summary: This is an email chain from August 26, 2019, among FBI personnel regarding logistical preparations for a hearing in the Jeffrey Epstein case scheduled for the following day. The emails discuss the need for agents to assist victims, provide support, manage press, and specify dress code and meeting details.

persons.name: Young, Amanda N.
persons.context: Appears as an FBI agent in New York, sending and receiving emails about logistical arrangements for the Epstein hearing assistance.

persons.name: Gander, Brian G.
persons.context: Appears as an FBI agent in New York, recipient of an email from Amanda Young regarding the hearing assistance.

connections.description: Both are FBI agents in New York coordinating on logistical tasks for an upcoming court hearing related to the Epstein case.

events.title: Epstein Case Hearing
events.description: A hearing regarding the Jeffrey Epstein case is scheduled for 10:30 AM. The SDNY anticipates at least 20 victims attending, with up to 30 expected, and has requested FBI assistance for victim support and press management.

keyFacts: A hearing in the Jeffrey Epstein case was scheduled for August 27, 2019, at 10:30 AM.
The SDNY anticipated at least 20 victims attending, with close to 30 expected.
The SDNY requested FBI assistance to help with victims, provide support, and help avoid the press.
FBI agents were instructed to wear suits and be on standby around 9:30/10:00 AM to meet at SDNY.
